title: Serial Killer But It's Guardian Angel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player each night.
- Watch over your target at night, Astrally Healing them and removing all negative effects from them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you will receive a player as your target.
- Your target cannot be a player who must die to win.
- You may watch over your target while dead.
- You may only watch over your target twice.
- If you are roleblocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their last will covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead.
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep your target alive until the end of the game.
